short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The best movie productivity tool professional edition for movie fans.
short.zh_CN: 为电影迷而生的电影效率浏览器插件专业版。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Filmbudd
Simple, private – and synced ratings and watch notes across all your devices.

User Guide https://filmbudd.com/docs/ext/usage/
Feedback https://roundtable.tbonesoft.com/products/7223247465271529472/add-review/

Change logs

## v2024.8.31

New Features
- Integration of Filmbudd Lite core features: conversion of IMDb ID text to links, quick search for selected keywords on Douban/IMDb;
- Integration of buttons for marking watched, want to watch and discarded movies.

Resolved Issues
- Improve the stability of the API service.

Miscellaneous
- Remove the dependency on Sign in with WeChat and WeChat Payment for the sake of user data security and improving user experience.
long.zh_CN:
Filmbudd 简单易用，尊重隐私和支持跨设备查电影评分、同步观影标记。

使用教程 https://filmbudd.com/zh-CN/docs/ext/usage/
问题反馈 https://roundtable.tbonesoft.com/products/7223247465271529472/add-review/

变更日志

## v2024.8.31

新功能

- 集成 Filmbudd Lite 核心功能：转换 IMDb ID 文本为链接、在豆瓣/IMDb 上快搜选中关键字；
- 整合标记已看、想看、弃看电影功能按钮，实现标记数据云存储和云同步，跨移动端和浏览器端展示和操作。

缺陷修复
- 提升接口服务稳定性。

其他
- 为了用户数据安全和提升用户体验，去掉微信登录、微信支付依赖。
